name: RacooChips
description:
Dev message : If it don't ask you a nickname at the main menu reload the page (if you don't it's not a problem the score will be recorded to no name until you enter a nickname)

You are a racoon running in a dangerous field that try to steal the chips bag.
Will you be the fastest player to steal it ?
► Online leaderboard on the main menu.

Unmentioned input : 
•  Escape / P to pause the game
• R to quick restart

Pre-made Assets :
• Sounds/Music from zapsplat.com.
• PlayFab API used to implement online stuff (Anonym accounts   (not working well on Web but fine on desktop) & leader board).
